meanings.sent1: The pond had noncirculating water, so it became stagnant.
meanings.sent2: The noncirculating air in the room felt stuffy and stale.
meanings.sent3: The noncirculating river refused to join the lively dance of the other streams.
meanings.sent4: Her noncirculating thoughts seemed trapped in a still, motionless pool.
meanings.sent5: The noncirculating lava cooled into a hardened, unmoving mass.

meanings.definition: Not moving in a circular pattern
meanings.sent1: The noncirculating fan only blew air in one direction.
meanings.sent2: The noncirculating wheel on the bike made it hard to pedal.
meanings.sent3: The noncirculating whirlpool puzzled the scientists with its unusual behavior.
meanings.sent4: His noncirculating thoughts spun in straight lines, never forming a circle.
meanings.sent5: The noncirculating galaxy appeared as a straight line in the telescope.

meanings.definition: Not available for borrowing from a library
meanings.sent1: The rare book was noncirculating, so it could only be read in the library.
meanings.sent2: The noncirculating reference materials were essential for the students' research.
meanings.sent3: The noncirculating novels tempted the readers with their forbidden stories.
meanings.sent4: Her noncirculating library card prevented her from borrowing any books.
meanings.sent5: The noncirculating archives held valuable documents that could not leave the building.
